title.value: Software-Engineering Design Patterns for Machine Learning Applications
title.justification: The title comprehensively reflects the core focus on software-engineering design patterns within machine learning applications as stated by the authors.
title.quote: Software-Engineering Design Patterns for Machine Learning Applications

extractions.description: This paper presents a multivocal literature review identifying 15 software-engineering design patterns for machine learning applications. The authors investigate the implementation of these patterns and highlight opportunities for increasing their adoption in practice by enhancing awareness within the community.

type.justification: The paper primarily focuses on a literature review to identify and classify design patterns, which is a theoretical contribution to the field.
type.quote: In this study, a multivocal literature review identified 15 software-engineering design patterns for machine learning applications.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on software-engineering design patterns specific to machine learning systems.
name.quote: In this study, a multivocal literature review identified 15 software-engineering design patterns for machine learning applications.

name.justification: The paper addresses design patterns tailored specifically for machine learning applications.
name.quote: Software-Engineering Design Patterns for Machine Learning Applications.

name.justification: The paper situates machine learning within the broader context of artificial intelligence, referencing patterns related to ML system architecture, programming, and model operation.
name.quote: The popularity of machine learning (ML) techniques has increased in recent years... ML techniques rely on mathematics and software engineering.
